tax.title: Portugal NHR Tax Calculator – Non-Habitual Resident Estimator (2025)

featureList: Choose income type: salary, pension, or dividends

featureList: Input gross annual salary in EUR

featureList: 🏠 Calculate capital gains on Spanish property sales

tax.title: US Self-Employment Tax Calculator – Schedule SE & Income Tax Estimator (2025)

featureList: 🎯 Social Security wage base cap ($176,100 for 2025)

🧮 Comprehensive deductions: retirement, health, home office

tax.title: Germany Vehicle Import Tax Calculator – Customs Duty & VAT Estimator (2025)
tax.description: Calculate import taxes for vehicles to Germany. Non-EU: 10% customs duty + 19% VAT. EU: VAT on new vehicles only. Includes relocation exemptions and vehicle registration costs.
featureList: 🚗 Calculate customs duty (10%) for non-EU vehicle imports
💰 Import VAT (19%) on total value including transport
🇪🇺 EU vs Non-EU import tax differences
📋 New vs used vehicle classification (6 months/6,000km)
🧾 Vehicle tax (Kfz-Steuer) based on engine size & CO₂
📊 Registration fees and TÜV inspection cost estimates
🇩🇪 Based on 2025 German customs and tax regulations

gov-benefits.title: Germany Child Benefit & Parental Leave Calculator – Kindergeld & Elterngeld Estimator (2025)

featureList: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Support for both parents with shared benefits

📊 Duration sliders and remaining months tracker
